About the Company: Nelcast Ltd was established in 1984. It has since been a significant and diligent participant in the manufacturing industry, producing superior quality casting components for every industry, with a special interest in those involved in automation. Taking products to the national and the global level in a short time period of two decades, Nelcast has procured some of the largest names in the business as part of its client list.
